title: Vicious Desire
description: *A Dark High School Bully Romance*Riley Appleton loves to hate me.It’s my fault the hate is there in the first place. She needed somewhere to direct her anger, and I volunteered to be the target.Being adored is boring.I wanted something different.Each jab that falls from her pretty mouth is a challenge, and the more we fight, the hotter we burn.But soon, this game of ours goes too far. She needs to be reminded who really rules this relationship.Our feud is a joke—but in the end, I’ll be the only one laughing.This is a dark high school bully romance with mature content and themes. It contains dubious situations that some readers may find offensive. If you're looking for a white knight hero, this book is not for you.Books 1-3 are a trilogy and need to be read together. Vicious Desire is the first standalone in the series.
author: S. Massery
